roleset.name: get rid of
roleset.note: DISCARD-V NOTES: Comparison with 'remove' (etc) suggests the 'source' argument, butthat doesn't appear in wsj usage and I can't come up with anice-sounding example. (from discard.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Instead, they figure the culprit probably took money from Ms. Shere's wallet and discarded all the tips in the five-by-eight-inch looseleaf.
example.arg: all the tips in the five-by-eight-inch looseleaf
